thread.section_title: indiavisaapplication.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of indiavisaapplication.com | indiavisaapplication.com
thread.title: Patty

author: Patty
title: Patty
text: I can't say enough how this company saved a very expensive trip by getting a Visa in 24 hours. Our Staff member thought his Visa was good for a few years and when he looked at it, it had expired the previous month. This is two days before his departure. I filled out the registration at 6:00 am one morning and had his Visa by 6:00 am the next morning in time for him to catch his flight that AFTERNOON...this company and the staff are 5 star all the way.
